name: Arborescent [The Last Tree]
description:
Arborescent

---Play as a tree fighting to avenge his fallen brothers. 

---Defeat the lumberjack army and their master.

---Fight through 3 sections and a boss battle.

---Explore a voxel style world and traverse varied terrain.

---Endless mode to come in the future.

learn more at www.biggsgames.com

Controls

---W A S D to move

---E to interact with objects

---Space Bar or left click to swing axe

Credits

---All assets including music and models made by team

---Original concept and idea

---Developed by BiggsGames over the course of 5 months

To the player

We appreciate you purchasing our project. Feel free to rate and leave a comment. We love suggestions and ideas. Join our discord on www.biggsgames.com. Thank you for playing!
